name: carabiner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an object used for attaching two things, for example by a climber for attaching a rope to a belt. It is oval or like a letter D in shape, with a part that opens and closes: I unclipped my carabiner from the rope.
Figure8Photos/E+/GettyImages
